ingredients.ingredient: 8 ounces guanciale (smoked pork jowl), thinly sliced
3 ounces finely grated Pecorino Romano cheese, divided

cookingTips: Render guanciale fat slowly to infuse the dish with flavor
Black pepper should be coarsely ground and abundant
Toss pasta directly in the pan with rendered fat and cheese for cohesion
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do rendered fat and assertive black pepper create the soul of this minimalist Roman dish?
